After performing the [[Multiple Shadow Clone Technique]], Naruto creates several [[Big Ball Rasengan]]. The clones then charge towards the target in horizontal line formation and slam their Rasengan into the target, causing a massive amount of damage.

== Trivia ==
* In ''Weekly Shōnen Jump'' publication, this technique was called {{translation|''Big Ball Spiralling''|大玉螺旋|Ōdama Rasen}}. This was later changed to {{translation|''Big Ball Spiralling Serial Zone Spheres''|大玉螺旋帯連丸|Ōdama Rasen Tairengan}} in the tankōbon version.
